bibl.seg: Winter John Garrett, Michigan Papyri. Volume III. Papyri in the University of Michigan Collection: Miscellaneous Papyri. (University of Michigan Studies. Humanistic Series. XL.)
Ann Arbor, University of Michigan Press, 1936, 4°, xviii-390 pp. et 7 pll.
P. Mich. III, 131-221. - Pp. 299-321: Ernst Honigmann, Die Anaphorai der alten Astrologen. P. Mich. III, 149.

C.R. par Harold I.
